item.title: Apple Aperture updates to 3.1.2
item.description: Apple has updated its Aperture software to 3.1.2 - it seems to focus on the new users who quite likely brought the Appstore copy.

item.title: Aperture 3 digital photo software improved integration with Flickr
item.description: I've been using Apple Aperture 3 for my digital photography and image processing for a couple of years.
